title: The Ultimate Guide to Grilling - How to Grill Just About Anythin
description:
The Ultimate Guide to Grilling: How to Grill Just About Anything

By  Rick Browne

Series: The Ultimate Guides
Paperback: 320 pages - Publisher: Skyhorse Publishing 
(June 29, 2011) - Language: English
ISBN-10: 1616080671 - ISBN-13: 978-1616080679

Rick Browne has traveled across America and tasted everything it has to offer. In The Ultimate Guide to Grilling, you will find recipes for plenty of bold barbecue concoctions, including Coca Cola Chicken, Aw Shucks Grilled Corn, BBQÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d Apple Pie, RodneyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Tequila Porterhouse, and so much more. Browne also goes beyond the call of duty with chapters on side dishes, sauces, marinades, and rubsÃ¢â‚¬â€he even includes an excellent chapter of delicious vegetarian recipes. The Ultimate Guide to Grilling is indispensable for all barbecue fanatics.
